00026 
00027 #include "lbann/utils/lbann_random.hpp"
00028 
00029 namespace {
00030 // Random number generator, file-visible only.
00031 lbann::rng_gen generator;
00032 }
00033 
00034 namespace lbann {
00035 
00036 rng_gen& get_generator() {
00037   return ::generator;
00038 }
00039 
00040 void init_random(int seed) {
00041   if (seed != -1) {
00042     get_generator().seed(seed);
00043 #ifdef LBANN_SET_EL_RNG
00044     El::Generator().seed(seed);
00045 #endif
00046   } else {
00047     // Seed with a random value.
00048     std::random_device rd;
00049     unsigned rand_val = rd();
00050     get_generator().seed(rand_val);
00051 #ifdef LBANN_SET_EL_RNG
00052     El::Generator().seed(rand_val);
00053 #endif
00054   }
00055 }
00056 
00057 void gaussian_fill(ElMat& mat, El::Int m, El::Int n, DataType mean,
00058                    DataType stddev) {
00059 #ifdef LBANN_PARALLEL_RANDOM_MATRICES
00060   El::Gaussian(mat, m, n, mean, stddev);
00061 #else
00062   gaussian_fill_procdet(mat, m, n, mean, stddev);
00063 #endif  // LBANN_PARALLEL_RANDOM_MATRICES
00064 }
00065 
00066 void bernoulli_fill(ElMat& mat, El::Int m, El::Int n, double p) {
00067 #ifdef LBANN_PARALLEL_RANDOM_MATRICES
00068   El::Bernoulli(mat, m, n, p);
00069 #else
00070   bernoulli_fill_procdet(mat, m, n, p);
00071 #endif  // LBANN_PARALLEL_RANDOM_MATRICES  
00072 }
00073 
00074 void uniform_fill(ElMat& mat, El::Int m, El::Int n, DataType center,
00075                    DataType radius) {
00076 #ifdef LBANN_PARALLEL_RANDOM_MATRICES
00077   El::Uniform(mat, m, n, center, radius);
00078 #else
00079   uniform_fill_procdet(mat, m, n, center, radius);
00080 #endif  // LBANN_PARALLEL_RANDOM_MATRICES
00081 }
00082 
00083 void gaussian_fill_procdet(ElMat& mat, El::Int m, El::Int n, DataType mean,
00084                            DataType stddev) {
00085   Zeros(mat, m, n);
00086   if (mat.Grid().Rank() == 0) {
00087     mat.Reserve(n * m);
00088     auto& gen = get_generator();
00089     std::normal_distribution<DataType> dist(mean, stddev);
00090     for (int col = 0; col < n; ++col) {
00091       for (int row = 0; row < m; ++row) {
00092         mat.QueueUpdate(row, col, dist(gen));
00093       }
00094     }
00095   }
00096   mat.ProcessQueues();
00097 }
00098 
00099 void bernoulli_fill_procdet(ElMat& mat, El::Int m, El::Int n, double p) {
00100   Zeros(mat, m, n);
00101   if (mat.Grid().Rank() == 0) {
00102     mat.Reserve(m * n);
00103     auto& gen = get_generator();
00104     std::bernoulli_distribution dist(p);
00105     for (int col = 0; col < n; ++col) {
00106       for (int row = 0; row < m; ++row) {
00107         mat.QueueUpdate(row, col, dist(gen) ? 1.0f : 0.0f);
00108       }
00109     }
00110   }
00111   mat.ProcessQueues();
00112 }
00113 
00114 void uniform_fill_procdet(ElMat& mat, El::Int m, El::Int n, DataType center,
00115                           DataType radius) {
00116   Zeros(mat, m, n);
00117   if (mat.Grid().Rank() == 0) {
00118     mat.Reserve(n * m);
00119     auto& gen = get_generator();
00120     std::uniform_real_distribution<DataType> dist(center - radius,
00121                                                   center + radius);
00122     for (int col = 0; col < n; ++col) {
00123       for (int row = 0; row < m; ++row) {
00124         mat.QueueUpdate(row, col, dist(gen));
00125       }
00126     }
00127   }
00128   mat.ProcessQueues();
00129 }
00130 
00131 }  // namespace lbann
